experiences_data.name: Linagora
experiences_data.description: A website to create and manage different type of CV with different templates.
missions: Create design of the architecture of an online CV generator
Find the best technologies to use for the project
Create and develop of its interface as well as its functionalities

experiences_data.name: Natixis
experiences_data.description: Redesign and add new features to a home page regrouping some applications of the company
missions: Redesign a home page regrouping some applications of the company for a better visual
Add new user settings to filter application user permissions
Add new features to centralize different types of events (alerts, notifications, ...)

experiences_data.name: Paperwork
experiences_data.description: A web app and a mobile app to help you to manage your french administrative paperworks.
missions: Develop the welcome page, login and register screen in the web app with React Typescript/SCSS
Develop the mobile app with React Native
Develop features of the back-office with Next.JS to manage the users and the paperworks
Develop a part of the logic of the server with Node.Js
Develop the tests for the front-end, back-end and mobile app
Help to develop the mobile app with Flutter and the back-end with Node.JS
Testing the app to find the bugs and to ensure the quality of the app with Jest
Deployement of the app on AWS

experiences_data.name: Ecocea Technologies - Manutan
experiences_data.description: An E-commerce website to sell products for companies.
missions: Maintain the e-commerce website
Develop new features
Cost estimation of the new features
Rework the website to improve the performance and the design from Figma mockups
Report the bugs and fix them in production
Demonstrate all new/modified features to the client
Implement Google reCaptcha V2
Implement tracking tools to monitor the website's performance and the user's behavior with Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager
Create the documentation to maintain and to develop the website for developers
Writing conception documents for the new features to check if the feature is possible to develop and to estimate the cost
Contact the client to understand his needs and his feedbacks about the website
